TopicTitle: What does the Devs use to model parts?

Articles.Content:
well yeah i wanna know what does the Devs use to model stuff

(coz i wanna make a new part?)

thanks in advance
This thread asking about how to model parts for KSP has been moved to [Modelling and Texturing Discussion](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/14-Modelling-and-Texturing-Discussion).
It probably depends on preference. C7 used Maya I think, others probably use Blender or 3DS Max. Both achieve the same or similar results - they're polygon modellers.

> 
> Porkjet uses Cinema4D! He's heroic.

And apparently wealthy.
